remarks: The composition of continuous functions is continuous.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-May-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Aug-2015.)
statement:
cnmpt21.j $e |- ( ph -> J e. ( TopOn ` X ) ) $.
cnmpt21.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. ( TopOn ` Y ) ) $.
cnmpt21.a $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. X , y e. Y |-> A ) e. ( ( J tX K ) Cn L ) ) $.

cnmpt22.d $e |- ( ( z = A /\ w = B ) -> C = D ) $.
cnmpt22 $p |- ( ph -> ( x e. X , y e. Y |-> D ) e. ( ( J tX K ) Cn N ) ) $.
